summary: craftable in glass, no perk required. 4 items
descriptionHtml:
Added an armor, craftable in glass, requires no perk

4 items - boots, gloves, pauldrons, cuirass

requires the HDT HighHeels System mod (https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/)
Have same stats as glass armor

Yes it is same model with my mod vampire dark knight. However, I added refraction to that armor, so it looks like glass
I don't recommend to use it with old video cards.
author: newmiller
